explanation: to increase the size or effect of something; to make something louder
sentence: A funeral can amplify the feelings of regret and loss for the relatives.
sentence_gap: A funeral can _______ the feelings of regret and loss for the relatives.

explanation: power and influence over other people or events
sentence: The small firms banded together so they would have more clout in Washington.
sentence_gap: The small firms banded together so they would have more _____ in Washington.

sentence: Making more cotton candy requires buying a new, bigger machine.
sentence_gap: Making more ____________ requires buying a new, bigger machine.

explanation: a pipe for waste water that crosses under roads, railways, etc.
sentence: The main culvert is now badly silted and will not pass storm flood flows.
sentence_gap: The main _______ is now badly silted and will not pass storm flood flows.

explanation: the part of a piece of equipment, for example, a microscope, through which you look
sentence: The tube containing the eyepiece and the objective is double.
sentence_gap: The tube containing the ________ and the objective is double.

sentence: He deals with subjects more fainthearted filmmakers would stay away from.
sentence_gap: He deals with subjects more ____________ filmmakers would stay away from.

explanation: a person who has sex with someone who they are not married to
sentence: I have no sympathy for liars or fornicators.
sentence_gap: I have no sympathy for liars or ___________.

explanation: to collect something, usually after much work or with difficulty
sentence: All the information that we garnered has been kept on file.
sentence_gap: All the information that we ________ has been kept on file.

explanation: to prepare someone carefully for a special position or job
sentence: Our junior employees are being groomed for more senior roles.
sentence_gap: Our junior employees are being _______ for more senior roles.

explanation: one of the parts of your finger where it bends
sentence: Charlotte rapped on the window with her knuckles.
sentence_gap: Charlotte rapped on the window with her ________.

sentence: They arranged to meet on the morrow.
sentence_gap: They arranged to meet on the ______.

sentence: Ageism is equally as offensive and pernicious as sexism.
sentence_gap: Ageism is equally as offensive and __________ as sexism.

explanation: a type of magic in which spirits, especially evil ones, are used to make things happen
sentence: It seems that some people still believe in sorcery and black magic.
sentence_gap: It seems that some people still believe in _______ and black magic.

explanation: energetic, exciting, and full of enthusiasm
sentence: The hope is that this area will develop into a vibrant commercial centre.
sentence_gap: The hope is that this area will develop into a _______ commercial centre.
